dependencies.description:
libarchive: C library and command-line tools for reading and writing
tar, cpio, zip, ISO, and other archive formats.
dependencies.name: libarchive

description:
NVIDIA Nsight™ Systems is a system-wide performance analysis tool
designed to visualize an application’s algorithms, identify the largest
opportunities to optimize, and tune to scale efficiently across any
quantity or size of CPUs and GPUs, from large servers to the smallest
system on a chip
name: nvidia-nsight-systems

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
